titleStmt.title: World Wide Diplomatic Archives Index: Nigeria
Nigeria

div.head: Legislation
div.p: All public archives should be made available to the public 25 years after their creation unless the creating agency chooses to keep them classified.

div.head: Location
div.p: Federal Ministry of Information and National Orientation: Department of National Archives of Nigeria, Radio House, Garki, Abuja, Nigeria.
Ministry of Foreign Affairs: Maputo Street, off Abidjan Street, Wuse Zone 3, P.M.B. 130, Garki, Abuja.

div.head: Procedures
div.p: Researchers should contact first the National Archives and then the Ministry of Foreign Affairs to inquire about access to relevant diplomatic archives.
